item.title: R Markdown Page
item.description: true This page provides an example of using R Markdown. x <- 1:10 y <- round(rnorm(10, x, 1), 2) df <- data.frame(x, y) df ## x y ## 1 1 1.03 ## 2 2 1.72 ## 3 3 1.86 ## 4 4 4.35 ## 5 5 4.56 ## 6 6 6.64 ## 7 7 8.34 ## 8 8 7.48 ## 9 9 9.57 ## 10 10 10.37
